name: undercover janitor
description:
In every tale, there is a powerful hero who fights against forces of evil.People only remember the flashy ones. Those who annihilate their enemies with colorful lasers and fancy explosions.

But there is an untold story. When the fight is over, every hero needs a sidekick to clean up the mess they made. 

 In this game, you are the undercover janitor! Your job is to rebuild the city after an apocalyptic fight against aliens. But you must hide yourself: you don’t want to ruin the hero’s reputation by attracting too much attention on yourself.

This game was made during the winter edition of WonderJam 2023

developpers:

Carl Aubin

Maxime Painchaud

Corentin Vernel-Wesolowski
